control.visible: [Window.IsActive(Settings.xml) | ListItem.IsFolder] + ![String.IsEqual(ListItem.Label,..) | String.Contains(ListItem.Path,videodb://movies/sets/) | container.content(Movies) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(Seasons) | container.content(Episodes) | container.content(musicvideos) | container.content(songs) | container.content(addons) | String.Contains(Container.FolderPath,plugin://,left)]
